opis: This reference stereo integrated amplifier is the product of expertise developed over decades of research, testing, and critical listening for the best possible reproduction of music.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Reference Integrated Stereo Amplifier with 200W and Custom HDAM

funkcije.opis: To achieve such high quality, while still delivering class-leading power, means optimizing each section of the amplifier for its task, just as would be done in a design using a separate preamplifier and monoblock power amps.
HDAM technology combined with optimized circuit design layout and carefully selected components, it provides exceptional sound quality and performance.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned PM-10 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
An important part of noise-reduction is the fact that the PM-10 is a purely analog amplifier: Marantz keeps things as clean and simple as possible with its highly-developed all-analog design.

Like the partnering SA-10 Super Audio CD/CD player/DAC, the PM-10 is constructed to the highest possible standards, with a double-layered copper-plated chassis for excellent rejection of mechanical and electrical interference, and casework constructed from thick, heavy, non-magnetic aluminum panels. Both products also sit on aluminum machining feet to reduce vibration for you to enjoy your music uninterrupted.

opis: Get the most musical sound possible from this Sound Master tuned integrated amplifier. Its custom designed technology delivers exquisite detail and unforgettable musicality from any style of music.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Premium Integrated Stereo Amplifier with 100W and Custom HDAM

funkcije.opis: You see and feel it in the build quality and you hear it every time. No matter your musical passions, your music always sounds better with MODEL 30.
Marantz HDAM-SA3 technology is comprised of dozens of independent parts, each hand-selected for pure, detailed Marantz sound.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned MODEL 30 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
Thanks to their exemplary build quality and feature-rich design, Marantz amplifiers are engineered to provide years of enjoyment, for you, for those that follow.

opis: MODEL M4 is a four-zone, rack-mountable distribution amplifier engineered to offer superb Marantz sound from a wide range of streamed music services, locally connected music sources, and your TV.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: 8 Channel Distribution Amplifier with 100W and Powered by HEOS™

funkcije.opis: MODEL M4 delivers enough power to drive speakers across four rooms in your home. For even more power, use Bridge Mode which offers up to 4 x 200W of output.
Stream your favorite music or TV audio (via the Optical inputs), independently or grouped, in four different rooms with MODEL M4’s four built-in HEOS modules.
With all the onboard features every integrator could need, MODEL M4 is extremely robust, easy to use, and flexible, making multi-room effortless.
Whether it’s using streamed services, your network, optical digital, or USB, with MODEL M4 you’ll experience your sound with the high resolution it deserves.
MMDF is a unique and sophisticated digital filtering technology that reveals the natural detail and tonality in sound.

opis: Enter a world of exquisite sound and elevated enjoyment of all your home entertainment sources without overwhelming your décor. STEREO 70s incorporates the technologies found in full-size surround sound home theaters with the simplicity and elegance of a two-channel stereo system.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Slimline Stereo Receiver with 75W, 8K and 6 HDMI Inputs

funkcije.opis: Marantz design is timelessly elegant—an expression of the musical soundscapes the products create. Our philosophy of balance and symmetry is evident in our sound and our designs. Meticulously engineered in a compact chassis, STEREO 70s fits where standard equipment cannot.

Carefully engineered with specially chosen components, STEREO 70s unveils the natural immersiveness and power of sound. Crystal clear digital decoding of up to 192 kHz 24-bit audio and DSD opens a new world of high resolution music with depth, breadth, and clarity not available with lossy files.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned STEREO 70s for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.

funkcije.naslov: Home Cinema from Only Two Channels
funkcije.opis: STEREO 70s merges the flexibility and features found in our CINEMA Series AVRs into a slim and simple 2 channel receiver. 8K HDMI plus ARC facilitates connection of smart TVs, game consoles and streaming systems. On screen display uses your TV screen to assist with setup. Support for up to 2 subwoofers means plenty of deep bass even when using small bookshelf speakers.

opis: MODEL 10 is the new reference in amplifier design. Featuring a newly designed dual-mono symmetrical amplifier topology, it is the most powerful, highest performing Marantz amplifier ever.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Reference Integrated Amplifier with 250W and All-New Marantz SMPS

funkcije.opis: From the triple-layer aluminum chassis with copper shielding to entirely original multi-layer PCBs, isolated sub-enclosures, and all new HDAM modules, MODEL 10 is the product of decades of expertise in audio engineering, setting a new benchmark with meticulous construction, state-of-the art technologies, and elegant design.

MODEL10 retains the sonic Marantz signatures of warmth, spaciousness, and resolution. However, advances in design and precise tuning by the Sound Master result in the purest expression of the Marantz sound ever. As a result, the listener experiences more detail, lower distortion, and higher dynamic range than ever before.

Designed with a brushed aluminum front, MODEL 10 is encased in a copper-plated, triple-layered chassis with illuminated mesh cover grille. Lighting inside the amplifier showcases the circuit boards, high-quality components, and specially designed transformer case. In a nod to the Marantz design DNA, MODEL10’s porthole houses a HD TFT Color Display for volume and input selection, along with a digital level meter that behaves like vintage analog meters.
MODEL 10 was conceived and engineered in our facilities in Shirakawa, Japan to deliver the highest performance.

opis: MODEL M1 is a wireless streaming amplifier engineered with performance and versatility in mind. Enjoy your favorite music or TV shows with seamless connectivity from one elegant, compact device.

funkcije.opis: MODEL M1’s 100W per channel of high-quality, low-distortion amplification delivers pristine sound anywhere, while a subwoofer output delivers room-filling scale in larger spaces.
However you choose to stream your high-resolution music, MODEL M1 has you covered, with support for HEOS, AirPlay2, Bluetooth, Spotify Connect, and more.
The expansive feature set yet diminutive size of M1 makes it the ideal partner for multi-room listening.
MMDF is a unique and sophisticated digital filtering technology that reveals the natural detail and tonality in sound.

funkcije.naslov: TV Sound: Marantz Quality, Soundbar Simplicity
funkcije.opis: Unveil superb sound from movies and TV programs with MODEL M1 using HDMI eARC and onboard Dolby Digital+ processing.

opis: MODEL 60n is a network integrated amplifier engineered for exceptional hi-fi performance and comprehensive connectivity. Stream in high-resolution via HEOS® Built-in, connect your CD player or turntable and complete your hi-fi system with the speakers of your choice, or an optional subwoofer.

funkcije.opis: Sound Master tuned and engineered to bring you all the texture, nuance, and clarity of the Marantz signature sound.
Stream in high-resoultion from today’s most popular music services, including TIDAL, with HEOS® Built-in.
Wide range of connections, including for a CD player and turntable, enable you to build a comprehensive hi-fi system.
Enjoy superior TV sound for your favorite movies and shows and enhance your gaming experience with MODEL 60n’s HDMI ARC connection.
Intuitive operation, designed with robust yet refined materials and available in two colorways: black and silver-gold.

opis: The PM6007 delivers a realistic listening experience and Marantz rich and spacious signature sound. With cutting-edge technologies, it is an ideal choice for those ready to elevate their 2-channel Hi-Fi system.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Slimline Integrated Stereo Amplifier with 45W

funkcije.opis: The PM6007 integrated current feedback amplifier powers 2x 45W (8 ohms RMS, 20Hz – 20kHz) to offer a refined audio experience.
The newly updated, high-quality DAC AK4490 offers a cleaner sound for your enjoyment.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned PM6007 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
Experience Hi-Res audio files exactly as intended through the following gold-plated inputs: 5 analog inputs, one coaxial input and two optical digital inputs.

opis: MODEL 50 was designed and engineered to be thoroughly modern, yet timeless. Engineered with Marantz proprietary technologies, this integrated amplifier pushes the boundaries of audio equipment design to reveal the musicality in all your stereo source components.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Premium Integrated Stereo Amplifier with 70W and Custom HDAM

funkcije.opis: We designed MODEL 50 to be thoroughly modern, yet timeless. Hallmark aesthetic cues like symmetry, warmth, and tactile satisfaction push the boundaries of audio equipment design inspired by icons of our past.
With a precisely engineered Class A/B amplifier, MODEL 50 will drive your loudspeakers with authority yet reveal details you never knew existed.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned MODEL 50 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
The built-in MM phono stage works with your turntable to amplify the nuance and tone in your records. Using a new circuit without distortion-inducing coupling capacitors.

MODEL 50’s stereo preamp outputs add valuable flexibility to your audio system setup. Connect a subwoofer, add channels to your home theater, or multiply listening zones—the possibilities are endless.

opis: Engineered and extensively tuned by a team drawing on decades of Hi-Fi expertise, the PM7000N provides exceptional performance for your audio collection. Whether digital or analog, enjoy the most musical sound from any source.

Wider dynamic range with lower distortion for the output stage from Marantz's latest HDAM-SA3 technology.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned PM7000N for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
Four analog inputs, one analog output, one coaxial input, two optical digital inputs and one USB-A for high resolution audio files.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Reference 2.1 Channel Fully Featured Streaming Preamplifier

funkcije.opis: From the triple-layer aluminum chassis with copper plating to entirely original multi-layer PCBs, isolated sub-enclosures and HDAM modules, LINK 10n is the product of decades of expertise in audio engineering. It sets a new benchmark with meticulous construction, state-of-the art technologies, and elegant design.

As the flagship digital player in the Marantz portfolio, LINK 10n features the best measured performance of any digital product we’ve ever produced. Through extensive and careful listening, the Sound Master has selected numerous premium parts to be included in key circuits that elevate audible performance to a new standard of excellence.

LINK 10n comes with a large high-resolution full-color display for a beautiful user interface and intuitive operation. Familiar arrow buttons make navigation effortless. Scroll to select your desired input and see source, track info, and play mode displayed on the screen, or enjoy easy HEOS onboarding and access to the app via a QR code.

Machined and brushed aluminum control surface, sculpted backshell, spun knobs, and high-resolution full color display are each striking features of 10 Series components. The design is both distinctively Marantz, drawing inspiration from classic models, and progressively modern.

LINK 10n can act as a complete preamplifier front-end for your system, with all the functions of a modern high-end stereo system. Complete with single ended and balanced analog inputs, digital inputs, and a Marantz Premium Phono EQ supporting both MM and MC cartridges, it is also a fully featured front end for even the highest performance stereo systems.

glavne_funkcije: Hi-Res Color New HD TFT Color Display

opis: Marantz has reimagined the integrated amplifier for the digital age while preserving a luxurious analog feel and sound.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Premium Integrated Stereo Amplifier with 70w, HDMI ARC and Powered by HEOS™

funkcije.opis: MODEL 40n follows a long line of historic Marantz pieces notable for their exquisite design. Every aspect is considered—from premium materials, symmetry, classic porthole display, and even smooth operation of the volume control. Your stereo doesn’t need to look like lab equipment. Marantz MODEL 40n begs to be heard, seen, and touched.

To preserve the detail, nuance, and essence of the music you love, Marantz developed HDAM (Hyper Dynamic Amplifier Modules) which are superior in their speed and response to off-the-shelf modules found in other products. MODEL 40n leverages this unique Marantz innovation to ensure whatever you’re listening to is always the most musical.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned MODEL 40n for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
Thanks to their exemplary build quality and feature-rich design, Marantz amplifiers are engineered to provide years of enjoyment, for you, for those that follow.

opis: The Marantz VS3003 HDMI Switcher allows up to three 8K devices to be connected to select Marantz 8K AV receivers. The switcher is compact sized for easy placement and includes a handy remote control.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: 3 In and 1 Out HDMI Switcher

funkcije.opis: No bigger than a Blu-ray case in width and depth, the VS3003 can fit just about anywhere. It also features a premium look thanks to a brushed black Aluminum front plate.

A wall-mount bracket is included to allow mounting the HDMI Switcher on a wall. It also features wired IR remote repeater connectivity in case the VS3003 and AVR are in a rack system or behind a cabinet blocking IR reception.
Use HDMI-CEC to power on and switch inputs automatically on both the HDMI Switcher and the AV receiver.

funkcije.opis: Excellence is heard and seen. CINEMA 30 is meticulously crafted in Japan with authentic materials in a modern style, befitting its rich heritage and stunning performance.
HiFi performance technologies like HDAM SA-2, and more elevate the CINEMA 30 to performance levels seldom found in an AVR.

funkcije.naslov: Sound Master Tuned & Calibrated For You
funkcije.opis: Powerful calibration and tuning tools are included, enabling you to get the best performance from your system.
Seven HDMI inputs, plus digital, analog, and phono inputs – even analog video plus loudspeaker and pre-amp outputs – ensure connectivity to virtually any components you have.

opis: Enjoy the most musical sonic performance from a compact, slim chassis. At half the height of a traditional AV receiver, the Marantz NR1510 delivers elevated surround sound and warm, rich high-fidelity audio.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Slimline 5.2 Channel AV Receiver with 50W, 4K and 6 HDMI Inputs

funkcije.opis: Slim profile that’s half the height of a traditional AV receiver delivers exceptional performance and the most musical sound.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned NR1510 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
Connect any pair of Bluetooth Headphones to the receiver and enjoy music or movie sound with pure freedom. With or without speakers turned on.

funkcije.naslov: More Vibrant Images With Dolby Vision
funkcije.opis: Supports Dolby Vision for enhanced picture quality. From vivid colors to darker shadows, enjoy a wider more diverse color gamut and experience.

opis: The MM8077 is designed to deliver impressive power, exceptional home theater amplification, and pristine high-resolution sound reproduction.

specifikacije.Main Amplifier In: Balanced & Unbalanced: 7ch (Exclusive use by a selector switch.)

dodatne_informacije.tagline: 7 Channel Power Amplifier with 150W

funkcije.opis: MM8077 is built to deliver on its promise of high-performance power. It’s no-nonsense, yet elegant design ensures that every ounce of amplification is available whenever you require it.

The power supply features a high current toroidal power transformer along with high power (71WVDC) filter capacitors with a total 100,000µF capacitance to easily handle sharp short-term transient peaks.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned MM8077 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.

Featuring our unique current feedback discrete power amp output stages that are identical for all channels, the MM8077 is equipped with multiple high current discrete power transistors that feature high slew rate and wide operating bandwidth to extract the most detail from today’s high resolution audio formats.

opis: Featuring an industrial design, high-capacity power supply, and assured system compatibility, MM7025 delivers an expansive soundstage and superior sound clarity

specifikacije.Display Off: Blue LED Illumination off mode available
specifikacije.Main Amplifier In: Balanced & Unbalanced: 8ch (Exclusive use by a selector switch.)

dodatne_informacije.tagline: 2 Channel Power Amplifier with 140W

funkcije.opis: If you’re impressed by elegantly restrained industrial design, the MM7025 is guaranteed to make a lasting – and very positive – impression.

As befits a Marantz amplifier, the high-capacity power supply begins with an oversized EI-core transformer feeding carefully chosen capacitors capable of storing 30,000 µF of energy. This combination instantaneously delivers peak power to all amplifier stages for distortion-free reproduction of the most complex sources.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned MM7025 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
Both single-ended RCA and balanced XLR inputs assure system compatibility regardless of your preamplifier or processor.

opis: AMP 20 is a remarkably powerful 12-channel amplifier, and can be paired with AV 20 for an elite, reference-level home theater system.

Our Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned AMP 20 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create outstanding sound in your home.
AMP 20 gives you 12 channels of commanding power in a single enclosure, each rated at 200 watts to perform at extraordinarily high levels with no loss in fidelity.
Make sure you get the best possible performance from your AMP 20 by combining it with other Marantz products – such as the AV 20.

opis: The MM7055 is a refined amplifier with ample power for the most demanding home theater setups and delivers exceptional musical clarity.

specifikacije.Display Off: Blue LED Illumination off mode available
specifikacije.Main Amplifier In: Balanced & Unbalanced: 5ch (Exclusive use by a selector switch.)

dodatne_informacije.tagline: 5 Channel Power Amplifier with 140W

funkcije.opis: Physically, the MM7055’s output stages mount on an extruded aluminum “thermal tunnel” for efficient heat dissipation.
In practical terms, the MM7055 is ideal for a “5.1” home theater system, whether based on a moderately powered receiver or a surround sound processor.
A massive power supply includes a multiple-secondary EI-core transformer and over 65,000 µF of custom-designed energy storage capacity.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned MM7055 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.

Balanced inputs and single-ended RCA inputs are both supported, and you can choose either type of input for each channel, individually, for easy and flexible connectivity. Audiophile grade, gold-plated four-way binding post speaker terminals insure tight connections to your choice of speaker wire.

opis: The SA-10 is a reference level SACD/CD player built to reproduce all the depth and detail of any recording and deliver a truly upscale listening experience.

specifikacije.CD Compatibility: CD / CD-R/RW / SA-CD /: Yes / Yes / Yes / Yes / Yes / Yes

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Reference SACD and CD Player with DAC and Custom HDAM

funkcije.opis: Whether playing SACDs, CDs, or other data discs containing music, it's vital that any player retrieves the information as accurately as possible: unlike a computer reading a disc for ripping, there's no time for repeated re-scans when playing music - it happens in real time, so the disc transport needs to get things right first time.
HDAM technology combined with optimized circuit design layout and carefully selected components, provides exceptional sound quality and performance.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned SA-10 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
Innovative Marantz Musical Mastering “MMM-Stream” up-sampling to DSD and filtering.

opis: Amazing digital audio experiences come from a surprising number of sources. Play them all with a single product—the Marantz CD 50n. Its modern digital engine reveals the finest details in high-resolution recordings available today.

specifikacije.Sample Rate USB type B In: up to DSD11.2 and PCM 384 kHz

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Premium CD and Network Audio Player and Powered by HEOS™ and HDMI ARC

funkcije.opis: Beautiful design and expert build quality complement the exquisite sound quality for which Marantz is famous.
Our thoroughly modern digital engine entices you to discover never-before-heard details in your favorite CDs.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned CD 50n for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
Hear TV, movies, and games in warm, spacious detail through your stereo with a single cable connection from the TV.
In addition to the traditional analog out use HEOS or the remote control to adjust volume output directly when driving a power amplifier.

opis: The reference-standard SACD 10 is crafted to be the very best using a fully Marantz designed SACDM-3 transport mechanism for maximum rejection of resonance.

specifikacije.H/P On.Off Setting: H/P Off automatically, when in use
specifikacije.Noise Shaper: MMM-Stream (Balanced, Natural, Dynamic Music, Dymanic Voice)
specifikacije.Fixed Analog Output (RCA): Cinch × 1Thick nickel plated Maching copper L/R independent terminals
specifikacije.Other: Stereo RCA Cable ×1emote connector cable ×1oA card

dodatne_informacije.tagline: High-Performance Reference SACD Player with SACDM-3 transport mechanism

funkcije.opis: From the triple-layer aluminum chassis with copper shielding to entirely original multi-layer PCBs, isolated sub-enclosures, and HDAM module, SACD 10 is the product of decades of expertise in audio engineering, setting a new benchmark with meticulous construction, state-of-the art technologies, and remarkable design.

SACD 10 retains the sonic Marantz signatures of warmth, spaciousness, and resolution. However, advances in design and precise tuning by the Sound Master result in the purest expression of the Marantz sound ever. As a result, the listener experiences more detail than ever before.
Made for the ultimate CD and SACD enthusiast, SACD 10 is engineered with updated Marantz Musical Mastering and a next generation HDAM module for impeccably detailed audio reproduction.

SACD 10 supports balanced sources via USB-A and USB-B DAC, plus DSD 256 and PCM 384 / 32 support. Connectivity options also include coaxial and optical digital outputs and inputs, and fixed level XLR and RCA analog outputs.

With a brushed aluminum control surface, spun finish details, a thick-section aluminum structure, copper-plated, triple-layered chassis, , SACD 10 is in a class of its own. Available in two colorways, Marantz Black and Marantz Champagne to complement any setting.

glavne_funkcije: Dual power supplies with toroidal transformers

opis: SACD 30n was designed for the experienced audiophile who appreciates flexibility in format and expects the most realistic sound. Hundreds of hours of careful Sound Master tuning ensure the exquisite detail and musicality Marantz has always delivered.

SACD 30n integrates the Marantz Musical Mastering digital-to-analog converter.

The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned CD6007 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.

opis: Extraordinary sound and peerless style—Marantz CD 60 celebrates your CD collection with a player engineered to sound better than any other in this class. Built with high quality materials and Sound Master tuned, CD 60 adds precision CD playback to MODEL 40n or any high-quality audio system.

funkcije.naslov: Luxurious Design Matches The Most Musical Sound
funkcije.opis: Architectural design, modern materials, and intuitive operation make CD 60 as incredible to behold as to hear.

funkcije.naslov: Unveil New Sounds In Classic CDs
funkcije.opis: CD 60 is for those who cherish their CD collections and who seek to discover new details upon every listen.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned CD 60 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.

In the CD 60, the proprietary HDAM circuit has been further optimized from its previous version by placing the parts symmetrically on the audio board and creating a more direct signal path. This update improves the sound stage from the previous models in pursuit of The Most Musical Sound.
The CD 60 can play back MP3, WMA, AAC and WAV, FLAC HD, ALAC, AIFF (up to 192-kHz/24bit), and DSD (up to 5.6- MHz) files from a connected USB storage device.

opis: Defined by its pristine sound, immaculate detailing, and superior quality cartridge, TT-15S1 reproduces immaculate high-fidelity.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Reference Belt Drive Turntable with Cartridge

funkcije.opis: The TT-1551 is more than just incredible to look at; it has been expertly engineered to provide the perfect platform for your records to sound their best. This includes a low-resonance high-density acrylic chassis and platter.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned TT-15S1 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.
To avoid any performance-limiting chassis vibration, the TT-1551’s precision motor system has been designed to ‘float’ rather than sit on the acrylic chassis.
TT-1551 belt drive system features an endless silicon belt for the smoothest possible rotation of the platter, ensuring precision timing and sensational listening.

opis: The Marantz M-CR612 is a compact network CD receiver that supports a near limitless array of streaming platforms and digital formats. Its effortless setup makes it an excellent option for those who seek a versatile multi-tasker that delivers exceptional sound.

funkcije.opis: The M-CR612 combines refined elegance and thoughtful design into a compact network CD receiver. Styled in a high-gloss black finish or silver-gold, the Melody X offers a beautiful look to complement its superb performance.

Engineered and extensively tuned by a team drawing on more than 65 years of Hi-Fi expertise, the M-CR612 provides exceptional performance for your audio collection. Whether digital or analogue, enjoy the most musical sound from any source.
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned M-CR612 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.

funkcije.naslov: Versatile Playback For All Your Audio
funkcije.opis: Plays CD, WMA/MP3 (CD-R/RW) and Features an AM/FM tuner. No matter how you listen, enjoy your music with elevated Marantz sound.

opis: Elegantly crafted from American Walnut and robust cast iron with a luxurious satin black finish, this optional tripod places your Marantz Horizon wireless speaker at the perfect height to create the optimal listening experience. Inspired by the walnut finishes used on iconic Marantz amplifiers of the past, the tripod complements any décor, and is as refined as the authentic, natural marble quarried to make the Marantz Horizon pedestal.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Pedestal for the Marantz Horizon Wireless Speaker

funkcije.opis: The Marantz signature sound, embraced by music lovers and critical listeners around the world, is synonymous with texture, nuance, and authenticity. It’s a sound like no other.
Elements of the iconic Marantz design ethos are strikingly reimagined and complemented with luxurious materials to create Marantz Grand Horizon’s unique yet timeless silhouette.
Marantz Grand Horizon features Marantz Radiance™ 360° Seamless Fabric. This engineering feat balances a seamless, luxurious feel, visual impact, durability, and acoustic transparency.

funkcije.naslov: Marantz Rise™ Amplifier and Marantz Gravity™ Drivers
funkcije.opis: The Marantz Rise™ Amplifier is the next generation of Marantz amplification. It quickly and accurately amplifies audio signals for a superior listening experience. The Marantz Gravity™ Drivers use neodymium magnets to ensure powerful, distortion-free sound.
Marantz Mirage™ is a bespoke, in-house Digital Signal Processing algorithm that helps create pristine sound that extends far beyond the physical boundaries of Marantz Grand Horizon.
